title: Ep 69: Making Makeup Fun With @RestroomRituals
itunes:title: Ep 69: Making Makeup Fun With @RestroomRituals
itunes:subtitle: Let’s bring the fun back into a makeup routine with Ashley Nelson of @RestroomRituals and Jolie DeFeis of Gee Thanks! Ashley joins us to talk about eyeshadow, getting a dewy look, and how to bounce back from a beat gone bad.JOIN ASHLEY AND JOLIE LIV...
description:
Let’s bring the fun back into a makeup routine with Ashley Nelson of @RestroomRituals and Jolie DeFeis of Gee Thanks! Ashley joins us to talk about eyeshadow, getting a dewy look, and how to bounce back from a beat gone bad.


JOIN ASHLEY AND JOLIE LIVE! Saturday, 3/26 on @GeeThanksJustBoughtItPod on Instagram! 7pm EST, 4pm PST. Ashley is going to do a makeup tutorial and teach Jolie how to create a Halo eye using: 

  • Danessa Myricks Colorfix in Exposed & Milky Way: https://fave.co/31iJYaq 
  • Hourglass Scattered Light Glitter Eyeshadow in Reflect - Champagne: https://fave.co/3ff9QMF 
  • MAC Eye Kohl Eyeliner in Costa Riche: https://fave.co/3tXRunM 
  • Follow along using any color combination you want! Just make sure you have at least 1 dark and 1 light eyeshadow – matte or shimmer! 


Mentioned On This Episode!

  • Danessa Myricks Colorfix Eyeshadows: https://fave.co/3rr9S6y
  • Saie Dewy Highlighter: https://fave.co/3cpcUEa 


Top 8 Best Selling Products in the Gee Thanks! Community in 2020!


8. The Hot Tub ($529): https://amzn.to/3aYP1TO

7. Digit for saving: https://digit.co/r/GeeThanks?ab

6. Rakuten for cash back while you shop: https://www.rakuten.com/r/CAROLI33174?eeid=28187

5. Universal Standard: https://fave.co/3l5KtN7

4. LED Lights: https://amzn.to/2WZO9WG

3. Home Comforts: https://bookshop.org/a/9875/9780743272865

2. The Revlon One Step: https://amzn.to/3o96cFO

1. The Garden Witch Overalls (Size up!): https://amzn.to/383oGlt


Subscribe to Hotline Skin, a once monthly newsletter about skincare product recs from Jolie: https://www.geethanksjustboughtit.com/hotline-skin 


As always, reach me at Caroline@geethanksjustboughtit.com, @geethanksjustboughtitpod on Instagram, or leave me a message at 424-245-0736. 


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
